title: game keeps crashing
body: im getting pissed really league im sick of this i cant even come home from work and enjoy a match every time

replies.body: I'd really like to help you out, but need some more information here.  Can you elaborate on what you mean exactly by crashing?  What are you seeing and when is it happening?  Are you receiving any errors?  Let me know!
it keeps crashing when ever iit tries to launch a match

this keeps happening to me as well.wgile on loading screen the game crashes and there is a crush report saying something about 3rd party applications.Then i have to repair otherwise i cant launch the game, even when i do repair though it just keeps happening
